information.html: Your Flexi Plus Fare booking comes with a complimentary seat. Please proceed to choose your preferred seat.

Since you have chose Super 6E prime, your booking includes a seat. Please proceed to select a seat of your choice.

You have added Super 6E Seat Eat to your PNR. By selecting 6E Seat Eat , you are entitled to choose a paid seat free of cost and get XL seat at {discountPercent}% discount. Please make your selection to proceed. For following flight -

Corporate Fare is successfully added to your booking. You are now entitled to choose a standard or XL seat at up to {discountPercent}% discount; kindly select and proceed. Please note that up to {discountPercent}% discount on XL seats is not applicable for bookings with infant(s).For following flight -

description.html:
1. I am able bodied and aged above 15 years.

2. I will not open or activate the emergency exit unless advised by the cockpit crew or cabin crew.

3. I am not travelling with infant or children below the age of 15 years or with anyone who requires special assistance in case of an emergency evacuation.

4. I am able to read (in Hindi or English) and understand instructions related to emergency evacuation provided by IndiGo in printed, handwritten or graphic form and able to understand oral crew commands (in Hindi or English).

5. I or persons travelling with me do not require safety assistant for emergency evacuation.

6. I do not have any permanent or temporary impairment like sensory impairment, strength or mobility limitation, intellectual impairment, or travelling with service dogs.

7. I do not require to use Portable Oxygen Concentrators on board the aircraft.

8. I am not pregnant or travelling with someone who is pregnant.

9. I do not require extension seat belt.

I confirm and agree to all the above and also understand that indiGo reserves all rights to change my/our seat(s) keeping in mind the overall safety.

Yes, I want to proceed with seat selection on emergency exit row.

subHeading.html: Do you wish to proceed with Auto Check-in?

description.html:
Note:

You have not selected seat for all passenger(s).

If you proceed without seat, IndiGo will auto-assign a seat prior to your travel. The boarding pass will be shared on your registered email id/WhatsApp.
